Generate a column specification

Source: R/parser.R
as.col_spec.Rd

This is most useful for generating a specification using the short form

Usage

as.col_spec(x)

Arguments

x

Input object

Value

a list / S3 object representing column specification

Examples

as.col_spec("cccnnn")
#> cols(
#>   col_character(),
#>   col_character(),
#>   col_character(),
#>   col_number(),
#>   col_number(),
#>   col_number()
#> )
